data.title: The Market Economy and the State Hayekian and Ordoliberal Conceptions
data.meta_description: There is not and has never been one liberal conception of the market economy and the state. In fact, the term “liberal” has received connotations that, especially in the United States but also, for example, in France, still support the old dictum of...
